titles.title: A bill to facilitate shareholder consideration of proposals to make Settlement Common Stock under the Alaska Native Claims Settlement Act available to missed enrollees, eligible elders, and eligible persons born after December 18, 1971, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Indian Affairs.

calendar.text: Committee on Indian Affairs. Ordered to be reported without amendment favorably.

action.text: Committee on Indian Affairs. Reported by Senator McCain without amendment. With written report No. 109-112.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 182.

vote.text: Passed Senate without amendment by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.
Referred to the House Committee on Resources.
Mr. Renzi moved to suspend the rules and pass the bill.
Considered under suspension of the rules.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with forty minutes of debate on S. 449.

vote.text: On motion to suspend the rules and pass the bill Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.
Message on Senate action sent to the House.

bill.summary: 3/13/2006--Public Law. Amends the Alaska Native Claims Settlement Act to make Settlement Common Stock under such Act available to missed enrollees, eligible elders, and eligible persons born after December 18, 1971.
